shopInfo.name: Sweet Delights
shopInfo.description: The best sweet shop in town offering a wide variety of traditional and modern sweets.

sweets.name: Chamcham
sweets.description: A delicious Bengali sweet made from chhena and soaked in sugar syrup.

sweets.name: Rasmalai
sweets.description: Soft paneer balls soaked in sweetened, thickened milk flavored with cardamom.

sweets.name: Peda
sweets.description: A popular Indian sweet made from khoya, sugar, and flavored with cardamom and saffron.

sweets.name: Gulab Jamun
sweets.description: Soft, deep-fried milk balls soaked in a fragrant sugar syrup.

sweets.name: Kaju Katli
sweets.description: A rich and delicious sweet made from cashews and sugar, garnished with edible silver foil.

sweets.name: Ladoo
sweets.description: A traditional Indian sweet made from gram flour, sugar, and ghee, shaped into balls.

sweets.name: Barfi
sweets.description: A dense, milk-based sweet made with condensed milk and sugar, often flavored with pistachio or almonds.

sweets.name: Jalebi
sweets.description: Crispy and juicy deep-fried spirals of dough soaked in sugar syrup.

sweets.name: Mysore Pak
sweets.description: A rich, sweet dish from South India made with ghee, sugar, and gram flour.

sweets.name: Kalakand
sweets.description: A popular Indian sweet made from solidified, sweetened milk, garnished with nuts.
